SEARCH
Package Models

Class PhaseTest

java.lang.Object
Models.PhaseTest
public class PhaseTest extends Object
The type Phase test.

This class contains unit tests for the initialization and validation of the startup phase of the game. It ensures that the game starts correctly and transitions into the expected phase.

  • Field Details

    • d_currentState

      CurrentState d_currentState
      The D current state.

      This field represents the current state of the game, including players, map, and other game data.

    • d_mainGameEngine

      MainGameEngine d_mainGameEngine
      The D main game engine.

      This field is responsible for managing the overall game flow, including the phases of the game.

    • d_startupPhase

      StartupPhase d_startupPhase
      The D startup phase.

      This field manages the startup phase of the game, responsible for initializing the game state and players.

    • d_map

      Map d_map
      The D map.

      This field holds the game map, which is used to manage territories and their relationships.

    • d_player

      Player d_player
      The D player.

      This field represents the player participating in the game.

    • d_mapController

      MapController d_mapController
      The D map controller.

      This field is responsible for loading and managing the game map.

      public PhaseTest()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Setup the test environment.

      This method initializes the necessary components, including the game engine, state, map, player, and assigns the map to the game state before each test case.

    • correctStartupPhase

      public void correctStartupPhase() throws CommandValidationException, IOException
      Test for correct initialization of the startup phase.

      This test checks if the correct startup phase is set in the game engine and ensures that the game phase transitions correctly to the startup phase.

      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if there is an error with command validation
      IOException - if there is an error with loading the map
